snippet.title: Brain Beats Official Trailer
snippet.description:
PStore: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP6015-CUSA23660_00-0557705828799124

Brain Beats is a VR rhythm music game that aim to create an immersive and engaging experience for a wide range of players. The game has 25+ tracks at launch to play and many more will come with DLCs after.

Hit the spheres and cubes at the right time with the correct hand to gain points and make the best possible score!

Relax with slower and calm tracks or get pumped with Energetic or Adrenalinic music!

Keep track of burnt calories for each song or playlist!
